name: Hell HQ: War Management Simulator
description:
What is this game?

A 2D war management simulation game where you play as the Devil's Head of Warfare at his company, Hell HQ. 

You curse humans  so that they fight each other at far as long as possible!

Why is there weird references in this game?

All of the quotes in this game from the Devil are references to one of my favorite movies: 

Office Space

How do you play?

There is an in-game tutorial. 

But if you're lazy:

1. Drag purple curses (on left of screen) onto humans. 

2. You get a higher score the longer you keep the war going.

3.  Slow down, pause/play, or speed up the game.

What are the controls?

This game is all mouse click! Occasionally you can press enter, but it's not necessary.
